column4: when i do sudo su i get cannot execute /usr/local/bin/bash: no such file or directory. i know the path should be /bin/bash
is there a way to fix this? when i do sudo su i get cannot execute /usr/local/bin/bash: no such file or directory. i know the path should be /bin/bash
